# Spatial signatures
- Characterisations of space based on form and function designed to understand urban environments

# This talk is about a ...
- How urban classifications can be used
- Web tool demo
- Broader framework to simulate scenarios in urban enviornments
- Satellite images and (vision) AI

# Development scenario modelling
A framework to experiment with land use scenarios for sustainable and equitable cities

![](../figures/202411_WUF/demoland_screen.png){.nostretch fig-align="center" height="400"}


## Vision
Demonstrate the societal impact of data-driven technology that empowers people to make better decisions about (urban) land use

## Goals
* Surface trade-off’s in (urban) land use policy through scenario generation
* Strategy over operations
* Reach into wide (non-technical) audiences
